title: The Hindenburg
writer: Richard Levinson (screen story), William Link (screen story), Michael M. Mooney (book), Nelson Gidding (screenplay)
actors: George C. Scott, Anne Bancroft, William Atherton, Roy Thinnes
plot: This film is a compendium of the facts and fiction of the events leading up to the disaster. For dramatic effect, Sabotage was chosen as the cause, rather than electricity lashing out at a couple of tons of hydrogen.
awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.
name: The Hindenburg
